recipe.title: Kapalua Butterfly
ingredients: 6 tablespoons canned cream of coconut (such as Coco López)*
2 teaspoons frozen orange juice concentrate, unthawed
Available in the liquor department of most supermarkets.
instructions: Combine first 6 ingredients in blender. Chill in freezer 30 minutes.Add ice to pitcher; blend until ice is finely crushed. Pour into brandy glasses.
